feed.title: theausinstitute TikTok
feed.subtitle: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from theausinstitute

entry.title: This morning Richard joined the Today Show to discuss the idea of an inheritance tax....."Countries that have inheritance taxes can have lower personal income taxes. So from an economist's point of view, it's a no-brainer," "I'd much rather pay tax when I
entry.content: This morning Richard joined the Today Show to discuss the idea of an inheritance tax....."Countries that have inheritance taxes can have lower personal income taxes. So from an economist's point of view, it's a no-brainer," "I'd much rather pay tax when I'm dead than when I'm alive." #auspol #ausecon

entry.title: When climate change has made bushfires and floods worse, and more frequent, there will be Australians who are unable to insure their homes. When you can't insure a house, you can't get a mortgage. - Executive Director Richard Denniss #auspol #climatechan
entry.content: When climate change has made bushfires and floods worse, and more frequent, there will be Australians who are unable to insure their homes. When you can't insure a house, you can't get a mortgage. - Executive Director Richard Denniss #auspol #climatechange

entry.title: While Australians are struggling to pay their rapidly growing bills, fossil fuel companies are making record profits. It's time to make fossil fuel companies pay the costs of climate change. #auspol #climatechange
entry.content: While Australians are struggling to pay their rapidly growing bills, fossil fuel companies are making record profits. It's time to make fossil fuel companies pay the costs of climate change. #auspol #climatechange

entry.title: Climate change induced natural disasters are driving up the cost of living, and Australians have had enough. Author of Climate of the Nation 2023 and Climate & Energy Researcher Liz Morison on this week's episode of Follow the Money, unpacking how climate
entry.content: Climate change induced natural disasters are driving up the cost of living, and Australians have had enough. Author of Climate of the Nation 2023 and Climate & Energy Researcher Liz Morison on this week's episode of Follow the Money, unpacking how climate change is weighing on Australians' minds, despite the cost of living crisis. Listen to the full episode via link in bio. #auspol #climatechange

entry.title: "We don't actually have any national climate policy." "We have targets. We have no policy to drive change." - Executive Director Richard Denniss #auspol #climatechange
entry.content: "We don't actually have any national climate policy." "We have targets. We have no policy to drive change." - Executive Director Richard Denniss #auspol #climatechange
